description: This file implements a utility function 'paginate_items' that provides in-memory pagination over a sequence of items, suitable for small datasets or pre-paginated data streams. It includes input normalization, calculates the slice of items for the requested page, and returns a dictionary containing the paginated items along with metadata such as total count, current page, and page size.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] paginate_items( items: Sequence[T] | List[T], page: int = 1, page_size: int = 10, )
methods.description: Provides paginated slice of items with metadata; clamps invalid inputs; suitable for small datasets or prior DB-level pagination.

ctags.name: paginate_items
ctags.signature: ( items: Sequence[T] | List[T], page: int = 1, page_size: int = 10, )
